content: the elevation sweater is a v neck long sleeved crochet sweater the boxy body and tapered sleeves make the elevation sweater a wonderful winter layering piece or wear it on its own for fall the body is created from 4 panels seamed halfway to create an elegant v-neck and then the sleeves are sewn on it s also accompanied by a video tutorial slightly_smiling_face sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl skill level easy check out more free crochet patterns here 1 sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
